## Story

We will read her story, "Beauty and the Beast, or, The Wound too Great", p. 291 in the [Oxford Anthology of the Brazilian Short Story, edited by K. David Jackson](Oxford Anthology of the Brazilian Short St - Jackson, K. David.pdf).
